entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
